a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Total annual deaths according to four sources. The WHO Mortality Database shows the number of deaths for which the
cause has been recorded. The other three sources: UN World Population Prospects, IHME Global Burden of Disease
and WHO Global Health Estimates, aim to estimate the total number of deaths using statistical modelling.
Data source: IHME (2019); WHO GHE (2020); WHO MD (2022); UN WPP (2022)
Note: The number of available sources differs by country or region.
